resources.string:
When you get a call from an unknown number, have you ever wondered whether it is the same number that you got a call from yesterday or last week? 
Whether it is the number which you didn’t bother to save? 

Then congratulations, you have already installed the solution. And you can exit the app now. 
When you are receiving a call, a note will be displayed informing you whether the caller has ever called you and if so how much time before. 

Caller information is taken from your phone call log. 

And you can add a custom note of your choice to be displayed with the last-called-time. 

All unknown numbers will be saved within the app itself. So you don’t have to worry if you accidentally delete entries in your phone call log. 

These services are invoked only when you are receiving a call. So this will not drain your battery. 

You can turn on/off app components individually.
